<h3 id="X22271">X(22271)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(2); A',B',C',X(10)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(1), WHERE A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(37)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (b + c) (a^2 b - a b^2 + a^2 c - b^2 c - a c^2 - b c^2) : :
